DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of candesartan cilexetil in preventing hypertension in people with high normal blood pressure. Patients will be randomized to either Candesartan or placebo for an initial 2-year period followed by a second 2-year period of placebo for all patients.
DOC.brief_title: TROPHY - Candesartan Cilexetil Long-term Hypertension Prevention Trial
DOC.criteria: Subjects between the ages of 30 and 65 (inclusive) at the time of the informed consent process have an average clinic BP in the high normal range of < 139/8589 mmHg or 130139/< 89 mm Hg (high normal BP range) (mean systolic and/or diastolic pressure based on 3 consecutive measurements) derived from the average of clinic visits 1,2 and 3. Have proteinuria >1 + (by dipstick method) have a stroke, myocardial infarction (MI), transient ischemic attack (TIA), the presence of any clinically significant evidence of atherosclerosis or hypertensive target organ involvement or any significant medical condition that may compromise participation in this study.
